channel.title: CVE Feed for frappe -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for frappe -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-42807|2024-09-24T14:50:49.075Z -- frappe -- lms
item.description: Frappe LMS is an open source learning management system. In versions 1.0.0 and prior, on the People Page of LMS, there was an SQL Injection vulnerability. The issue has been fixed in the `main` branch. Users won't face this issue if they are using the latest main branch of the app.

item.title: CVE-2024-34074|2024-06-04T17:41:36.130Z -- frappe -- frappe
item.description: Frappe is a full-stack web application framework. Prior to 15.26.0 and 14.74.0, the login page accepts redirect argument and it allowed redirect to untrusted external URls. This behaviour can be used by malicious actors for phishing. This vulnerability is fixed in 15.26.0 and 14.74.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-34074|2024-08-02T02:43:00.126Z -- frappe -- frappe
item.description: Frappe is a full-stack web application framework. Prior to 15.26.0 and 14.74.0, the login page accepts redirect argument and it allowed redirect to untrusted external URls. This behaviour can be used by malicious actors for phishing. This vulnerability is fixed in 15.26.0 and 14.74.0.
